content: X-FCP Sealing ring Sealing ring for checker plate fastener discs ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Forms a water-resistant seal at checker plate fastenings Is applicable for various environmental conditions - both mild indoor and extreme outdoor Minimalizes the effects of vibration on the connecting grating parts Applications To be used with the X-FCP grating disc for proper sealing It is placed underneath the X-FCP disc before tightening the disc for sealing purposes ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Grating For use with (tools): BX 3, DX 351 Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor temporary applications, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution, Coastal areas, Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution Technical Data | Application | Grating | For use with (tools) | BX 3, DX 351 | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor temporary applications, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution, Coastal areas, Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 308856 - Sealing ring X-FCP - Package Size 200 pc
